name: PRIME EDUCATION HEALTH LEARNING SERVICES
briefDescription: We implement Educational, Vocational and Counselling Programs for children in special circumstances and/or with special needs. Beneficiaries 300 children in state-run shelter homes.We do Child Abuse Awareness and Prevention workshops in Schools and shelter homes. Beneficiaries - 3000 children, 200 teachers in 2015-16.We do Medical Relief in calamities and have worked in Uttarakhand, Nepal and Chennai during natural calamities in these areas. Beneficiaries 10,000+.
